pr_title: Eliminate wildcard imports in QS and added script for check QS

timeline.bodyText: This is not a helpful error message. Please don't use star imports in your Java files: would be better.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,6 +19,13 @@ jobs:
           key: ${{ runner.os }}-maven-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
           restore-keys: |
             ${{ runner.os }}-maven-
+      - name: Check Wildcards
+        run: |
+          if [ $(git grep import | grep '\*;' | grep -E -v '(.mvn/|README.md|CONTRIBUTING.md)' | wc -l) != 0 ]; then
+            echo "Wildcard found!"

replies.bodyText: PR was updated as requested, resolving the conversation
replies.author: rsvoboda

timeline.message: Eliminate wildcard imports in QS and added script for check QS to ensure no new appear in the codebase.
